<<<<<<< HEAD
A vindication of Their Majesties authority to fill the sees of the deprived bishops in a letter out of the country occasioned by Dr. B---'s refusal of the bishoprick of Bath and Wells. Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.
[4], 27 p.
Printed for Ric. Chiswell ..., London : 1691.
Attributed to Edward Stillingfleet. cf. NUC pre-1956. Dr. B--- is William Beveridge. cf. DNB. Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
=======

Printed for Ric. Chiswell ..., London : 1691.
